import React,{useState,useRef}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import ReCAPTCHA from"react-google-recaptcha";import"./SignUp.css";// Ensure correct import path for other CSS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignUp(){const navigate=useNavigate();// Hook to navigate between routes
const[formData,setFormData]=useState({username:"",password:""});const recaptcha=useRef();const handleSignUp=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const captchaValue=recaptcha.current.getValue();if(!captchaValue){alert("Please verify the reCAPTCHA!");return;}try{const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:8082/signin",{username:formData.username,password:formData.password,captchaValue:captchaValue});if(res.status===200&&res.data.message==="Login successful"){// Redirect to admin page after successful login
navigate("/Admin");}else if(res.status===401){// Display error message to the user for invalid username or password
alert("Invalid username or password");console.error("Invalid username or password");}else{// Handle other error cases
console.error("An error occurred:",res.data.message);}}catch(err){console.error(err);// Handle network or other errors here
alert("Invalid username or password");}};const handleCancel=()=>{navigate("/");// Navigate to the home page on cancel
};const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData({...formData,[name]:value});// Update the form data
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Log In to Your Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSignUp,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group-username",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Username:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",name:"username",onChange:handleChange,value:formData.username,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group-password",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",name:"password",onChange:handleChange,value:formData.password,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancelbutton",type:"button",onClick:handleCancel// Navigate to home on click
,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"loginbutton",type:"submit"// Change to type "submit" to trigger form submission
,children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"recaptcha-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReCAPTCHA,{ref:recaptcha,sitekey:process.env.REACT_APP_SITE_KEY})})]})]});}export default SignUp;
